about_the_game:
Play basketball on a court laid atop your desk space, making incredible plays with simple controls!
Let's play with up to 4 players!

Each desktop court is uniquely built from everyday objects, like stationary, candy, or even a fish tank!

Customize your players to form a unique and unbeatable team!

[Practice Game]
Experience exciting matches in single player!
Learn the controls and tricks as you go!

[Friendly Game]
Play competitively or cooperatively with up to 4 people!
From simple courts to special ones loaded with gimmicks, there are tons of stages to try!
Adjust your game plan to the surroundings and come out the winner!

[Team Selection]
"Each player can be customized individually!
Make use of stat boosting items with your chosen uniform to build your own unbeatable dream team!"

[Tournament]
Take on the Championship Cup!
Enhance your team, perfect your techniques, and aim for the top in the World Cup!

[Capsule Dunk]
Use the points you've gained from playing different modes to get new formations, uniforms, and rare items to take your play to the next level!

[Mini Game]
Try your hand at Shoot to Score!
Adjust your distance and power to get more points!

*Controllers are required for multiplayer play.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R7 Graphics / Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
